casebody.data:
No. 21,

Misc.

Poland v. California. Lawrence Speiser for petitioner. Stanley Mosk, Attorney General of California, and Doris H. Maier, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent. Solicitor General Cox filed memoranda for the United States.

Appellate Department, Superior Court of California, County of San Joaquin. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
